attributes.action: overturn the recent ruleing on the GURKER and give ALL of them imediate UK Residancy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Gurkers have fought for us and fight for us on the FRONT LINES for over 200 years. They REALLY are BRITISH. Certainly more British than some eastern eroupean recent vistors, who have no conection with nor served the UK  in anyway  
They  give at least 15 years (which is the the max time of their enlistment).So how can the achive the 20 Years srvice demanded to stay in the UK? 
All Gurkers who have serverd the Crown for 4 years (as applies to Commonwealth forces)should be given full uk reidency, equal pension / pay status wih regular HM Forces and recognised for past and continued service

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
